verses.name: Leviticus 2:3
verses.text: And the remnant of the meat offering shall be Aaron’s and his sons’: it is a thing most holy of the offerings of the Lord made by fire.

verses.name: Leviticus 2:4
verses.text: And if thou bring an oblation of a meat offering baken in the oven, it shall be unleavened cakes of fine flour mingled with oil, or unleavened wafers anointed with oil.

verses.name: Leviticus 2:5
verses.text: And if thy oblation be a meat offering baken in a pan, it shall be of fine flour unleavened, mingled with oil.

verses.name: Leviticus 2:6
verses.text: Thou shalt part it in pieces, and pour oil thereon: it is a meat offering.
